lead_paragraph: BLUMENTHAL--Celia. Celia, you were always kind and compassionate. You will be greatly missed by me and my entire family. You added so much to my life Celia. I am eternally grateful to you. Our thoughts and prayers go out to your children, your sister, brother, and their respective families. Rest in peace my dear friend. Jeri, Sandy, Zachary and Zoey Cohen 1/3
